alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 1:29PM CST until January 09 at 2:15PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Washington County in southwestern Alabama... Southern Wayne County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 215 PM CST. * At 128 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northeast of Richton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Buckatunna. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for southwestern Alabama...and southeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for southwestern Alabama...and southeastern Mississippi.
